actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to establish a select joint committee to review Federal campaign spending law and make recommendations to Congress for such legislation as it deems appropriate.

summary.text: Establishes a select joint committee to review Federal campaign spending laws and to make recommendations to Congress for such legislation as it deems appropriate, including the possibility of establishing an independent Federal campaign practices commission.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to establish a select joint committee to review Federal campaign spending law and make recommendations to Congress for such legislation as it deems appropriate.
